Creamy Mushroom and Onion Pasta.author: Chef Petya
Creamy Mushroom and Onion Pasta.title: Creamy Mushroom and Onion Pasta
Creamy Mushroom and Onion Pasta.subtitle: A Luscious and Heartwarming Pasta Dish
Creamy Mushroom and Onion Pasta.shortDescription: A classic pasta dish featuring a rich creamy sauce, sautéed mushrooms and onions, and a sprinkle of fresh parsley.
Creamy Mushroom and Onion Pasta.ingredients: 500g pasta, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 large onion, 3 cloves garlic, 400g mushrooms, Salt, pepper, 1 teaspoon thyme, 200ml heavy cream, 50g grated Parmesan cheese, Fresh parsley
Creamy Mushroom and Onion Pasta.description: Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. In a pan, sauté onions, garlic, and mushrooms, then create a creamy sauce with heavy cream and Parmesan. Combine with pasta and serve with a garnish of parsley.

Mushroom Risotto.author: Chef Petya
Mushroom Risotto.title: Mushroom Risotto
Mushroom Risotto.subtitle: A Creamy and Comforting Italian Classic
Mushroom Risotto.shortDescription: This Mushroom Risotto is a creamy, savory dish, with perfectly cooked Arborio rice and flavorful sautéed mushrooms.
Mushroom Risotto.ingredients: 1 cup Arborio rice, 1/2 cup white wine, 4 cups chicken stock, 1 cup mushrooms, 1 small onion, 2 cloves garlic, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, Salt, pepper, 1 tablespoon butter
Mushroom Risotto.description: Simmer chicken stock, and separately sauté onions, garlic, and mushrooms. Toast Arborio rice, add wine, then slowly incorporate the stock until creamy. Finish with butter and Parmesan.

Mushroom Soup.author: Chef Stefan
Mushroom Soup.title: Mushroom Soup
Mushroom Soup.subtitle: A Rich and Earthy Soup for the Soul
Mushroom Soup.shortDescription: A hearty and comforting soup made with a blend of mushrooms, root vegetables, and a touch of cream for richness.
Mushroom Soup.ingredients: 500g mixed mushrooms, 1 large carrot, 1 potato, 1 celery stalk, 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 litre vegetable stock, 200ml heavy cream, Salt, pepper, 2 tablespoons olive oil, Fresh herbs for garnish
Mushroom Soup.description: Sauté vegetables and mushrooms, add stock and simmer. Blend until smooth, stir in cream, and serve with fresh herbs.

Mushroom Stroganoff.author: Chef Stefan
Mushroom Stroganoff.title: Mushroom Stroganoff
Mushroom Stroganoff.subtitle: A Hearty Vegetarian Twist on a Russian Classic
Mushroom Stroganoff.shortDescription: This Mushroom Stroganoff offers a meat-free alternative to the traditional dish, featuring a rich, savory sauce and tender mushrooms.
Mushroom Stroganoff.ingredients: 600g mushrooms, 2 tablespoons butter, 1 onion, 1 clove garlic, 1 teaspoon paprika, 2 tablespoons flour, 300ml beef stock, 1 tablespoon mustard, 200ml sour cream, Salt, pepper, Chopped parsley, Cooked rice or pasta to serve
Mushroom Stroganoff.description: Cook mushrooms with onions and spices, thicken with flour, then add stock and mustard. Finish with sour cream and serve over your choice of rice or pasta.

Mushroom Quiche.author: Chef Sophie
Mushroom Quiche.title: Mushroom Quiche
Mushroom Quiche.subtitle: A Savory and Elegant Brunch Classic
Mushroom Quiche.shortDescription: A delightful quiche filled with sautéed mushrooms, onions, and creamy Gruyere cheese, baked to perfection.
Mushroom Quiche.ingredients: 1 pie crust, 300g mushrooms, 4 large eggs, 200ml heavy cream, 1 cup grated Gruyere cheese, 1 small onion, Salt, pepper, 1 tablespoon olive oil, Nutmeg
Mushroom Quiche.description: Sauté onions and mushrooms, blend eggs with cream and cheese, and bake in a crust until golden.

Garlic Butter Mushrooms.author: Chef Sophie
Garlic Butter Mushrooms.title: Garlic Butter Mushrooms
Garlic Butter Mushrooms.subtitle: A Simple and Flavorful Side Dish
Garlic Butter Mushrooms.shortDescription: Sautéed cremini mushrooms tossed in a rich garlic butter sauce, perfect as a side or topping for steaks and burgers.
Garlic Butter Mushrooms.ingredients: 500g cremini mushrooms, 4 tablespoons butter, 5 cloves garlic, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar, Salt, pepper, Chopped chives for garnish
Garlic Butter Mushrooms.description: Brown mushrooms in garlic and butter, then flavor with soy sauce and balsamic vinegar. Garnish with chives to serve.
